short_description:
Our delicious lemonade is made simply, with natural ingredients and a delicate balance of sweet and sour. For Simply Lemonade with Strawberry, we added an extra twist—the sweet taste of strawberries.

Delicious and refreshing, Simply Lemonade with Strawberry is a delightful, all-natural and non-GMO fruit juice beverage that tastes as close to homemade lemonade as you can get, all in one beautifully simple bottle. There are no surprises here. Just simple ingredients and a deliciously refreshing taste.

One sip of this all-natural refreshment can take you right back to an ice-cold glass pitcher on a lazy summer afternoon or makeshift lemonade stands on quiet neighborhood streets. That’s because Simply Lemonade with Strawberry tastes as close to homemade as it gets.

Be sure to try all Simply Lemonade flavors, like original Simply Lemonade, Simply Lemonade with Mango or Simply Lemonade with Raspberry.

Simply products start with great-tasting fruit and end with great-tasting fruit juices, fruit drinks and fruit smoothies. That’s because we believe the best things in life are made simply. And we hold everything— from all-natural Simply Fruit Punch to Simply Lemonade—to the same high standard with our “Fresh Taste Guarantee.” Whatever juice or juice drink you’re looking for, the choice is simple.

With Simply Lemonade with Strawberry, the difference is clear. Clear enough that you can see the all-natural ingredients inside. Because with Simply, there’s nothing to hide.

product_name: Hi-C Orange Lavaburst Fruit Juice, 6 fl oz, 8 Juice Boxes
short_description:
Treat your kids to fun fruitiness with Hi-C Orange Lavaburst Juice Boxes. A delicious blend of orange and pear that will quench their thirst with on-the-go convenience. Made with real fruit juice from concentrate, these juice boxes for kids contain 100% Vitamin C and 40 calories per box. Ideal for lunch boxes, after school, hanging with their friends, or anytime they need flavor-filled drinks that you'll feel good about giving them. Stock up on all the flavors they love, all with a full day's supply of vitamin C.

In 1946, during the post-war boom of innovation and industry, Niles Foster set his sights on the market for convenient fruit based beverages. What captured his imagination was the idea of an orange drink, bubbly and bright, that would appeal to families seeking vitamins alongside refreshment. It needed to have a balance of tangy citrus and sweet flavors and possess the genuine nutrition of natural Vitamin C, the ingredient that earned the drink its name—Hi-C––because of its high content of Vitamin C compared to competing juices. The drink was immediately a hit in the south and in just a decade became a nationwide success. Over the years a variety of flavors have been added to the Hi-C portfolio.
This product is Shelf-Stable.
ingredients: PURE FILTERED WATER, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, ORANGE AND PEAR JUICES FROM CONCENTRATE, LESS THAN 0.5% OF: NATURAL FLAVORS, CITRIC ACID (PROVIDES TARTNESS), VITAMIN C (ASCORBIC ACID), POTASSIUM CITRATE (REGULATES TARTNESS), SUCRALOSE, ACESULFAME POTASSIUM.

short_description: CELSIUS® is functional, Essential Energy, a better-for-you, premium alternative to traditional energy drinks. It also includes guarana seed extract, ginger root for flavor and digestion, vitamin C to help support your immune system, vitamin B for energy production, and chromium to help control hunger, making it an ideal pre-workout drink. In baking, A2 milk powder enhances the texture and flavor of cakes, cookies, and muffins, contributing to moist and flavorful results. It's perfect for creating creamy desserts such as puddings, custards, and ice creams that are sure to please any sweet tooth.

The story of New England Coffee begins in the Old World, with a family living in Greece. From there, Menelaos Kaloyanides, with his brother George Kaloyanides, came to the United States in 1910. By 1916, Menelaos was running a successful restaurant in Boston, but he wanted to start his own business. So he, along with his brother George and his cousin Megaklis Papadopoulos, founded the New England Tea & Coffee Company. Located at Milk and Broad Streets in Boston, they delivered coffee to restaurants all over the city. Slowly but surely, the company gained a reputation for consistently good coffee and coffee beans. As its reputation grew, so grew the reach of the company's deliveries and the size of its accounts. While many things have changed over the decades, the commitment to quality has never wavered.

short_description: Sparkling Water & Real Squeezed Fruit, Blood Orange Tangerine, Unsweetened.  No sugar added. Yup, that's it. We squeezed 3/4 of a blood orange & 1-1/4 real tangerines into this 8-pack of sparkling water. Fruit from farms. We're self-proclaimed fruit fanatics. So our approach to orange had to be anything but ordinary. Enter: Blood orange. Mysterious, multi-dimensional, and delicious. Cloaked in an unassuming exterior, its striking, scarlet-painted pulp makes for a remarkable reveal. The taste? Perhaps even more remarkable still. But why stop there? To elevate orange further, we added a splash of bright, sweet tangerine to up the ante. Together, the taste of blood orange tangerine is truly something special. An orange for those who seek the unique. Chef's kiss. Cheers! Just sparkling water & real squeezed fruit.

Like all Waterloo carbonated water flavors, it has zero calories, zero sugar or sweeteners, and zero sodium to support healthy, active lifestyles.

When Guy shared his love for summers in the Northeast — family fun at the boardwalk with a cup of lemony Italian ice in hand — we couldn't wait to dive in. We knew we needed tart yet sweet – a familiar Lemon combo but a tricky balance to strike. We fine-tuned the sour flavors to add fresh Lemon pucker as well as the sweet flavors for balance and extra complexity. At last, it was time to take in the fresh, lemony aroma and be transported to a place where summer never ends! Enjoy Waterloo carbonated flavored water, perfect for anytime, anywhere.

product_name: Topo Chico Sparkling Mineral Water Glass Bottles, 12 fl oz, 12 Pack
short_description: This legend speaks of the virtues of the water that since 1895 has given its name to one of the most important drinks in all of Mexico: Topo Chico Mineral Water.There was a beautiful Aztec princess who suffered a terrible disease. A disease so strange that no doctors of her father, Moctezuma I Ilhuicamina, successor in 1440 of the King Itzcoatl, had been able to cure.Desperate, the King turned to the older priests in the kingdom to find a cure for his beautiful daughter. They told him that according to the timeless stories of travelers, in a far away northern land, there were strange and hidden waters which flowed at high temperatures. Waters in which one only needed to bathe in or drink from to regain vigor, joy, strength, and refreshment.Encouraged by this news, Moctezuma I ordered an immediate expedition to take his daughter to this amazing place. After traveling long and rugged roads, the Princess and her expedition reached a fertile valley flanked by mountains. To the east, they saw a mountain with the form of woman’s face (now Cerro de la Silla) and a mole-shaped hill, from whose slopes flowed the prodigal waters.After spending some time there, taking baths and drinking from the water, the daughter of Moctezuma I, his priests, and chiefs returned to the Anahuac lands optimistic, strong, happy, and refreshed. The news about the Princess's recovery spread throughout the kingdom and has passed from generation to generation up until modern times.Anyone who has tasted a cold Topo Chico sparkling mineral water on a warm day can believe the story of such spectacular refreshment.

product_name: Waiakea Bottled Water, Hawaiian Volcanic Alkaline Water, 500ml (16.9 oz) Bottles, 6 Pack
short_description:
Sourced from one of the purest environments on Earth, Waiākea’s deep well is located at the base of the active Mauna Loa volcano on the Big Island of Hawai'i. Snow-capped and pristine, this volcano is positioned 2,400 miles from the nearest industrial landmass and surrounded by 10 million square miles of ocean.

Waiākea gets all of its minerals and alkalinity naturally, as it is filtered through thousands of feet of porous lava rock before re-emerging at its source. This incredible environment and unique process give Waiākea an award-winning tasting profile that has been embraced and loved by water lovers everywhere for its distinctive taste and terroir.

As an industry leader in sustainability, Waiākea has a Carbon Neutral footprint and all of their bottles are created from 100% recyclable materials. In addition to the amazing taste and eco-initiatives, they also pledge to help the local community through their Kokua Initiative and the people in Malawi, Africa in partnership with Pump-Aid.

This all-natural juice beverage is perfect to start your day or refresh your meal—anytime of year.

It makes for a wonderful fruit juice drink on its own or mixed with other juices. That’s because it’s perfectly sweet, perfectly tart and perfectly cranberry.

If you’re looking for a variety of other fruit juice flavors, Simply Juice Drinks have you covered with offerings like Simply Peach, Simply Watermelon and mixed blends like Simply Fruit Punch and Simply Pineapple flavors.

product_name: Martinelli's Gold Medal 100% Apple Juice, 10 fl oz, 4 Count Shelf-Stable
short_description: Martinelli's Gold Medal Apple Juice is 100% apple juice made from U.S. grown fresh apples using the Gold Medal Process. This process begins with a blend of fresh apples of the finest varieties, including the flavorful Newtown Pippin, which helps us achieve the perfect balance of sweetness and tartness with no concentrates or chemical preservatives. The apples are thoroughly washed and hand-sorted to remove defects and then ground to a pulp and cold pressed to release the delicious Shelf-Stable fresh juice. They are then flash-pasteurized, hot-filled into new bottles, capped, and quickly cooled to retain the fresh apple flavor. Ensuring superior quality, Martinelli's Gold Medal Apple Juice is perfect for a packed lunch, after-school snack, picnic basket, road trip snack, or drink at home.

short_description:

Ideal for lunch boxes, after school, hanging with their friends, or anytime they need flavor-filled drinks that you'll feel good about giving them. Stock up on all the flavors they love, all with a full day's supply of vitamin C.

In 1946, during the post-war boom of innovation and industry, Niles Foster set his sights on the market for convenient fruit based beverages. What captured his imagination was the idea of an orange drink, bubbly and bright, that would appeal to families seeking vitamins alongside refreshment. It needed to have a balance of tangy citrus and sweet flavors and possess the genuine nutrition of natural Vitamin C, the ingredient that earned the drink its name—Hi-C––because of its high content of Vitamin C compared to competing juices. The drink was immediately a hit in the south and in just a decade became a nationwide success. Over the years a variety of flavors have been added to the Hi-C portfolio.

With 15 cans to a case, and you read that right, there's an extra three cans in this case, you'll have plenty of Mtn Dew to fuel your adventures. Experience the classic flavor of Mtn Dew. Finally, a new kind of soda that's delicious, refreshing, and actually good for you. OLIPOP combines the classic soda flavor you know and love with prebiotics, plant fiber, and botanicals to support your microbiome and digestive health.
